name: Spawn of Akyishigal
description: The Spawn of Akyishigal is a medium-sized chaotic evil fiend, characterized by its malice and cunning nature.
memorable: It can command insectoid beasts and summon swarms, complicating battles for its foes.
goals: To manipulate and control lesser creatures while spreading chaos and malice.
relations: Related to other powerful fiends and could be encountered with insect-like monsters.
environment: Typically found in areas teeming with insect life, thriving in chaotic settings.
strengths: Immunity to poison damage and resistance to cold, fire, and lightning.
weaknesses: Average intelligence might limit its strategic options in combat.
attacks: Uses a Multiattack featuring a Bite and two Sting attacks, causing piercing and poison damage.
most_powerful_ability: Can summon swarms of insects to act as allies in battle, complicating combat for enemies.
senses: The creature has darkvision up to 60 feet, allowing it to see in dim light and darkness.
skills: Good at evading attacks due to its Dexterity saving throw bonus.
additional_information: Controls lesser insectoid beasts with its Command Vermin ability.
Gains advantage on saving throws against spells, showcasing its magic resistance.
Can create two swarms of insects to perform its bidding in battle.
Attack from its Sting has potential to poison targets, impairing their actions.
Notable for combining physical and magical resilience.
test_queries: chaotic fiend commanding swarms of insects
medium fiend with poison immunity and swarm ability
monster that summons insect swarms in battle
Spawn of Akyishigal tactics and abilities
